Class Coordinates

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--Coordinates
Direct Known Subclasses:
CircleCoordinates, LineCoordinates
public abstract class Coordinates
extends java.lang.Object

Provides the coordinates of thePoints that make up shapes suitable for drawing. Maintains an enumeration of the points, which can be accessed using hasMorePoints() and nextPoint(). The enumeration can be reinitialized with enumerate().

Version:
1.0 -- March 30, 1999
Author:
C. Vickery
